name: @kontent-ai/model-generator
description: This utility generates strongly-typed models based on Content Types in a Kontent.ai project. These models can be used with SDKs
author: richard sustek

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run ts-lint:check && npm run build:all
scripts.build:all: npm run build:es6 && npm run build:esnext && npm run build:commonjs
scripts.test:all: npm run build:commonjs && npm run test:delivery-models
scripts.test:delivery-models: npm run clean-sample-directory && npm run build:commonjs && dotenv -e ./.env cross-var -- node dist/cjs/lib/cli/cli --outputDir=./sample --isEnterpriseSubscription=true --apiKey=%API_KEY% --environmentId=%ENVIRONMENT_ID% --sdkType=delivery --addTimestamp=%ADD_TIMESTAMP% --browserModuleResolution=%BROWSER_MODULE_RESOLUTION% --contentTypeResolver=pascalCase --elementResolver=camelCase --fileResolver=snakeCase
scripts.test:help: npm run build:all && cd sample && dotenv -e ../.env cross-var -- node ../dist/cjs/lib/cli/cli -h
